```{r Setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
```


```{r Plots, include=FALSE}
out <- NULL
for (i in names(Plots)) {
  PlotId <- substr(i, nchar(i), nchar(i))
  PlotBoxWidth <- switch(Configs[[paste0("Config", PlotId)]]$PlotBoxSize[1], "large" = 12, "big" = 9, "normal" = 6, "small" = 3)
  out <<- c(out, column(width = PlotBoxWidth, Plots[[i]]))
}
```

`r paste(out, collapse = "\n")`
